name: Run 'n Gun (BragosMagos)
description:
Run 'n Gun is a school project that I've decided to continue working on even though I've already handed it in. It's going to be a fast paced multiplayer(with singleplayer gamemode) shooter with a lot of focus on keeping velocity, jumping and not stopping. Health management is also going to be a core mechanic, as the lower health you have the harder you'll be to spot, so it might sometimes be beneficial to have low health.

Note: Still very much a prototype and WIP. It's also being developed in the spare time of a 13 year old with limited unity experience, so please keep that in mind when giving feedback.
